Title: Prohibits landlords from charging potential tenants application fees greater than the actual cost of a credit check or other related services paid by the landlord
Summary: Allows landlords to charge potential tenants application fees no greater than the actual cost of a credit check or related services paid to a third party by the landlord, and in no event shall such fee exceed $30.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to fees landlords may charge tenants
